title: Work Experience
body:
Hello...
First time writing on the board :P
I want to know if there is a Riot Games Company to do my work experience in Adelaide, South Australia.
As one of a LOL player, I really want to see how they work and what they do.
If anyone knows, can I know the location, e-mail and phone number of Riot Games Company in Adelaide (if one exist) plzzzzzzzz {{item:3070}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Sorry mate, the only Riot office in this region is in Sydney. 
At the moment, we don't offer any work experience positions.
Out of curiosity is there available positions for low to moderate experienced people with an interest in LoL?
